metadata.title: Spleasy - Split bills instantly
metadata.description: The simplest way to track shared expenses without sign-ups.
metadata.ogDescription: As the name suggests, we make splitting bills easy. Just create a group, share the link, and start splitting.

items.question: How to split money when traveling in a group without mistakes?
items.answer: Use Spleasy to enter expenses as they happen. Who paid? For whom? The app automatically calculates precise debt balances so you only need one transfer at the end of the trip.

items.question: Why use Spleasy instead of a notebook?
items.answer: Notebooks are prone to errors and make cross-calculations difficult (A paid for B, B paid for C). Spleasy automatically optimizes transactions, reducing the number of necessary transfers.
